page.title: 09The River Marden,Wilts.
page.content: The River Marden runs through Calne.It used to be called the River Calne.It is a long river,and very old.It is a good place for fishing for trout. On a section of the river near the Calne Town Hall,called Doctor's Pond,there are some ducks.This is where Joseph Priestley did experiments with oxygen. At the moment members of the Calne Community are cleaning the river bed out,and making the riverside paths tidier,so that people can walk along it,and enjoy the scenery.People can go fishing there too.
